column1: '''''Christie's 20th Century Books and Manuscripts 2 December 2003''''' is an auction catalogue from Christie's. It includes the following Tolkien-related lots:<ref name=TB>{{webcite
*Lot 36 (p. 24): - A letter to [[Letter to Jennifer Brookes-Smith (26 September 1947)
column2: Jennifer Brookes-Smith (26 September 1947)]]. One page of the letter is reproduced in a photograph.

column1: *Lot 37 (p. 25): A letter to [[Letter to Jennifer Brookes-Smith (28 July 1955)
*Lot 38 (pp. 25-6): A letter to [[Letter to Jane Neave (15 November 1961)
column2: Jane Neave (15 November 1961)]]. The first page of the letter is reproduced in a photograph.

column1: *Lot 39 (p. 26): This lot consists of a typed copy of the poem [[Little Princess Mee
